overview: Two new Vivid Girls take on a legend. Can they handle Rocco? It's a rite of passage for every Vivid Girl: A slammin', jammin', rockin' scene with film legend Rocco Siffredi... and if there's anal, toys and a facial in the end, that's okay too. Lexi and Monique... are you ready?
title: Lexie and Monique Love Rocco
